name: Resident Evil 6: Archives
summary: Celebrate the upcoming release of Resident Evil 6 with the best of the Resident Evil franchise. Included in this Xbox 360 exclusive package is the latest installation of the blockbuster series, Resident Evil 6, the feature film Resident Evil Degeneration, and downloadable copies of Resident Evil 4 HD, Resident Evil CODE Veronica X HD and Resident Evil 5 (with bonus Gold Edition content) redeemable on Xbox LIVE.
